snippet: AMSTEIN--Charles A.,83, died April 7, 2016. A memorial service is planned at Rutgers Presbyterian Church, located at 236 West 73rd St. in NYC on June 11, 2016 at 4pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: AMSTEIN--Charles A.,83, died April 7, 2016. A memorial service is planned at Rutgers Presbyterian Church, located at 236 West 73rd St. in NYC on June 11, 2016 at 4pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AMSTEIN, CHARLES A.
